page.title: 03Bridport Market
page.content: Bridport is one of the largest towns in West Dorset and on market days it is very busy. The market takes place every Wednesday and Saturday thoughout the year. The market consists of a number of stalls set up on the wide pavements of the main shopping streets of East Street, West Street and South Street. There is a wide variety of different stalls including food, clothing, crafts, antiques and garden stalls. Some of the stall holders are Bridport shop-keepers, but many stall holders come from as far afield as Yeovil, Ilminster and Exeter. Many shoppers come to Bridport especially for the market, not only from West Dorset but also from Devon and Somerset.
